00031 #if !defined(sc_cthread_process_h_INCLUDED)
00032 #define sc_cthread_process_h_INCLUDED
00033 
00034 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_thread_process.h"
00035 
00036 namespace sc_core {
00037 
00038 // friend function declarations:
00039 
00040 void SC_API halt( sc_simcontext* );
00041 
00042 //==============================================================================
00043 // sc_cthread_process -
00044 //
00045 //==============================================================================
00046 class sc_cthread_process : public sc_thread_process {
00047 
00048     friend class sc_module;
00049     friend class sc_process_handle;
00050     friend class sc_process_table;
00051     friend class sc_thread_process;
00052     friend class sc_simcontext;
00053 
00054     friend void sc_cthread_cor_fn( void* );
00055 
00056     friend void halt( sc_simcontext* );
00057 
00058   public:
00059     sc_cthread_process( const char* name_p, bool free_host,
00060         SC_ENTRY_FUNC method_p, sc_process_host* host_p, 
00061         const sc_spawn_options* opt_p );
00062 
00063     virtual void dont_initialize( bool dont );
00064     virtual const char* kind() const
00065         { return "sc_cthread_process"; }
00066 
00067 private:
00068 
00069     sc_cthread_process( const char*   nm,
00070             SC_ENTRY_FUNC fn,
00071             sc_process_host*    host );
00072 
00073     // may not be deleted manually (called from sc_process_b)
00074     virtual ~sc_cthread_process();
00075 
00076     bool eval_watchlist();
00077     bool eval_watchlist_curr_level();
00078 
00079     void wait_halt();
00080 
00081 };
00082 
00083 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 //"sc_cthread_process::wait_halt"
00085 //
00086 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 inline void sc_cthread_process::wait_halt()
00088 {
00089     m_wait_cycle_n = 0;
00090     suspend_me();
00091     throw sc_halt();
00092 }
00093 
00094 } // namespace sc_core
